author: feedback@businessinsider.com (Ignacio Montes-Jovellar), Ignacio Montes-Jovellar
title: I got COVID-19 after a Disneyland trip. At the peak of Spain's infection, I was sent to a full hospital with overflowing toilets.
description: Business Insider España After going on vacation to Disneyland Paris with my family, I started to notice I wasn't feeling too well. The symptoms initially resembled those of the standard flu. But after getting to the stage where I could barely get out of bed, …
content:
On March 8, I went to Disneyland Paris with my family to enjoy a few days of vacation.
At the beginning, everything seemed fine.
After the trip, however, my eldest son, who's seven years old, began to feel ill.
Thankfully, he was unwell only for a few days… [+4283 chars]
